医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Shift Bioscience 融资 1600 万美元用于推进细胞模拟 AI 平台Shift Bioscience 是一家生物技术公司，利用生成式人工智能模型来了解不同基因的激活如何逆转衰老过程。这项研究是设计更有效的药物来治疗与年龄相关的疾病的重要一步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Shift-Bioscience-raises-2416-M-to-advance-cell-simulation-AI-platform.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Shift-Bioscience-raises-2416-M-to-advance-cell-simulation-AI-platform.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=635f32dd-6b27-4cfa-8b59-0e6a85540248 Wed, 16 Oct 2024 01:35:00 -0400 Shift Bioscience raises $16 M to advance cell simulation AI platform
一项大型多种族研究发现了长期新冠病毒的遗传风险因素研究人员在最大的多种族 GWAS 中发现了与长期新冠病毒相关的基因位点和表型，揭示了疲劳、抑郁和纤维肌痛等慢性疾病的危险因素增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Genetic-risk-factors-for-long-COVID-uncovered-in-a-large-multi-ethnic-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Genetic-risk-factors-for-long-COVID-uncovered-in-a-large-multi-ethnic-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f868572d-36fc-4de7-aba2-494b00966fa3 Wed, 16 Oct 2024 01:22:00 -0400 Genetic risk factors for long-COVID uncovered in a large multi-ethnic study
Refeyn 推出新的质量光度测定产品以简化生物分子分析工作流程开创性质量光度测定技术背后的公司 Refeyn 又迈出了一步，通过发布强大的耗材产品组合扩展，确保质量光度测定成为一种更简单、更高效的生物分析工具。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Refeyn-introduces-new-mass-photometry-products-to-streamline-biomolecular-analysis-workflows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Refeyn-introduces-new-mass-photometry-products-to-streamline-biomolecular-analysis-workflows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ba27c6e1-5c98-4006-b60d-a3e04a338072 Wed, 16 Oct 2024 01:14:00 -0400 Refeyn introduces new mass photometry products to streamline biomolecular analysis workflows
抗体工程推动药物开发创新单克隆抗体 (mAb) 用于预防、检测和治疗多种非传染性和传染性疾病。过去几年，单克隆抗体市场呈指数级增长，从 2024 年（预计 2023 年底为 2,376.4 亿美元）到 2033 年（预计为 2023 年底将达到 6,790.3 亿美元），预计复合年增长率 (CAGR) 为 11.07%。 2033）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Antibody-engineering-drives-innovation-in-drug-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Antibody-engineering-drives-innovation-in-drug-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=62acad11-c1af-4787-bf22-7e6e3e8f27fa Wed, 16 Oct 2024 00:54:30 -0400 Antibody engineering drives innovation in drug development
研究人员通过新颖的多组学方法发现了阿尔茨海默病进展中的独特细胞脆弱性研究人员利用单细胞和空间基因组学来绘制颞中回细胞类型特异性变化图，从而识别阿尔茨海默病进展的不同疾病阶段。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Researchers-uncover-distinct-cell-vulnerability-in-Alzheimere28099s-progression-with-novel-multiomics-approach.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Researchers-uncover-distinct-cell-vulnerability-in-Alzheimere28099s-progression-with-novel-multiomics-approach.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8a87b1dc-31db-4538-9577-b624390d2104 Wed, 16 Oct 2024 00:46:00 -0400 Researchers uncover distinct cell vulnerabilities in Alzheimer’s progression with novel multiomics approach
结构生物学揭示了 B1 维生素运输和缺乏的分子基础维生素 B1，也称为硫胺素，对于细胞的生存至关重要。人体无法产生这种维生素，但我们可以通过食用鲑鱼、豆类和糙米等食物来维持这种维生素的健康水平。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Structural-biology-uncovers-the-molecular-basis-of-b1-vitamin-transport-and-deficiency.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Structural-biology-uncovers-the-molecular-basis-of-b1-vitamin-transport-and-deficiency.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f41a3d4d-5f50-4743-a64c-df0e73e291ac Wed, 16 Oct 2024 00:43:57 -0400 Structural biology uncovers the molecular basis of b1 vitamin transport and deficiency
使用消费设备进行实时全身动作捕捉的新系统西北大学的工程师开发了一种新的全身动作捕捉系统——；它不需要专门的房间、昂贵的设备、笨重的相机或传感器阵列。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/A-new-system-for-real-time-full-body-motion-capture-using-consumer-devices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/A-new-system-for-real-time-full-body-motion-capture-using-consumer-devices.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c6948342-b587-489e-9b6b-4ba734853a6d Wed, 16 Oct 2024 00:36:41 -0400 A new system for real-time full-body motion capture using consumer devices
纽约大学朗格尼分校的研究人员应对癌症患者心力衰竭的挑战美国心力衰竭协会今天发布的一份新的科学声明强调了心力衰竭 (HF) 与癌症之间的重要联系，以及导致这两种疾病发生和进展的共同机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/NYU-Langone-researchers-address-the-challenges-of-heart-failure-in-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/NYU-Langone-researchers-address-the-challenges-of-heart-failure-in-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b23f5ab6-b711-4608-81c5-b8548b6bdcd7 Wed, 16 Oct 2024 00:32:01 -0400 NYU Langone researchers address the challenges of heart failure in cancer patients
Antiverse 筹集 350 万英镑（460 万美元）以推进生成式 AI 抗体设计平台Antiverse 是一家为具有挑战性的目标设计抗体的科技生物公司，今天宣布其种子资金增加了 350 万英镑（460 万美元）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Antiverse-raises-c2a335-M-(2446-M)-to-advance-generative-AI-antibody-design-platform.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Antiverse-raises-c2a335-M-(2446-M)-to-advance-generative-AI-antibody-design-platform.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84e5bab7-43fa-483e-a2ab-7312adc4d9f4 Wed, 16 Oct 2024 00:32:00 -0400 Antiverse raises £3.5 M ($4.6 M) to advance generative AI antibody design platform
Alleo 和 Ubiquigent 建立人工智能驱动的战略合作伙伴关系，以加速以 DUB 为重点的药物发现Ubiquigent Limited（“Ubiquigent”）是一家药物发现和开发公司，利用新型去泛素酶（DUB）调节剂作为新疗法来满足医疗需求高度未得到满足的领域，今天宣布与先驱 Alleo Labs Corp.（“Alleo”）建立战略合作伙伴关系利用人工智能（AI）开发神经系统疾病的新疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Alleo-and-Ubiquigent-enter-AI-driven-strategic-partnership-to-accelerate-DUB-focused-drug-discovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Alleo-and-Ubiquigent-enter-AI-driven-strategic-partnership-to-accelerate-DUB-focused-drug-discovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=37e107bf-4734-4171-ba12-8e1b49212fa0 Wed, 16 Oct 2024 00:32:00 -0400 Alleo and Ubiquigent enter AI-driven strategic partnership to accelerate DUB-focused drug discovery
